page.title: 05Recreation in Cropredy
page.content: In the school on a Thursday evening there is a youth club,set up by the children and Mr McRobie as a Problem Solving Project. The youth club is for all the 3rd and 4th year junior child ren at Cropredy school and all the 1st and 2nd year children at secondary school in and around Cropredy.There is a new senior youth just started for the 13-18 year olds.It is held in the school hall but not run by the school staff.There are senior football and cricket teams that play local leagues, they import players from other villages.There is an Under 13 Football team that play on the recreation ground. They play teams in the villages in a 15 mile radius of Cropredy. Also on "the rec" are swings, slides, a climbing frame, a roundabout and a large grass area.The railway runs at the bottom and we wave to the trains.
